## Some information about me

Hello visitor! My name is Utku Odabasi, I am studying *Master of Financial Analysis* in *London Business School*. I am passionate about creating valuable impact. That is why I am aiming to have a career in management consulting.

* I have graduated from Istanbul Technical University, reach link [here](https://www.itu.edu.tr/en/homepage)
* I have internships in various industries including Telco, Tech, Asset Management and Management Consulting
